name: CoRBY
description:
Free casual logical game about colors for Android.

This color puzzle is the potential to challenge yourself.

The main goal of the game is to merge as many blocks as possible. It is based on idea of Goethe's symmetric color wheel with reciprocally evoked colors.

Try to score more points. Think two steps ahead. Good luck!

This indie game is completely free and doesn't contain any ads or another purchases.

CoRBY is acronym for 'Composition of Red, Blue, Yellow'. It is named after work of Piet Mondrian.
